# adding(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a new measurement by adding the receiver to the specified measurement.

## Declaration

```swift
func adding(_ measurement: Measurement<Unit>) -> Measurement<Unit>
```

## Parameters

- **measurement**: The measurement to be added.

## Return Value

A new measurement with a value equal to the receiver’s value plus the value of the specified measurement converted into the unit of the receiver.

## Discussion

This method raises an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/invalidArgumentException] if the receiver cannot be converted to unit.

You can use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSMeasurement/canBeConverted(to:)] method, passing the unit of the specified measurement, to determine whether a measurement can be converted to a particular unit before calling this method.

## Operating on Measurements

- **subtracting(_:)**: Returns a new measurement by subtracting the specified measurement from the receiver.
